definitions.definition: An exploration; a tour of a place to see what it is like.
To seek for something or after someone.
To examine or investigate something systematically.
definitions.example: The committee has been exploring alternative solutions to the problem at hand.

definitions.definition: To travel somewhere in search of discovery.
definitions.example: It was around that time that the expedition began exploring the Arctic Circle.
It is normal for a boy of this age to be exploring his sexuality.

definitions.definition: To be engaged exploring in any of the above senses.
definitions.example: He was too busy exploring to notice his son needed his guidance.

definitions.definition: To wander without any particular aim or purpose.
definitions.example: The boys explored all around till cold and hunger drove them back to the campfire one by one.

definitions.definition: To seek sexual variety, to sow one's wild oats.
